website_summaries.verdict: Great choice for users who seek out environmentally friendly products. Amazingly low price point for 6-foot by 9-foot rug pad. We recommend it highly as an affordable fix for slippery rugs on tile or laminate flooring.
pros: Grid pattern is easy to trim down for smaller area rugs
Non-slip coating is revived after machine washing
cons: Should not be used on hardwood flooring, despite manufacturer's claims of safety
Thicker than some other polymer rug pads but not especially cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps to keep the rug in place, On smaller throw rugs, like 12 x 24" you need to cut it to almost the full size or it will slip. Easy to cut with regular household scissors,I have already cut my piece up for 4 different rugs and have some left ofer for a couple more. I kept the scraps and put them in drawers to keep the trays from sliding.
customer_reviews.author: RW/DP

customer_reviews.title: Permanently stuck to concrete floor
customer_reviews.text: It permanently stuck to my finished concrete floor and the small section I have tried to clean off so far has not been easy. Not looking forward to cleaning the whole 9x12 area, and there is a chance I might have to refinish the floor if it doesn't come off completely. Beware of this rug pad.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Would not hesitate a second to repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Best quality rug pad I've ever found. I purchased this after our previous once kept breaking down and leaving a fine powdery dust that would come out from underneath the rug. The rug also slipped around despite the non-slip padding underneath it. Enter the NaturalAreaRug. It changed how I cleaned in the best way possible. This product is very high quality. No shedding fine dust, no rug moving around even with the dog pouncing all over the rug. It has gone through two moves now, and it honestly looks like brand new still. I would not hesitate to re-purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive...you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Nice rug , but it is crooked and big. Ordered the exact size I needed but had to cut it down & straighten out a side. As long as you are willing to do this, the price isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: LainieH

customer_reviews.title: A Little Cockeyed, but Still Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got the the 3' x 5'--it was true to size and of good quality. My only complaint is that it came a bit skiddy-wumpus... more of a parallelogram than a rectangle. The pad itself wasn't pulled out of shape, it just looks like it went through the cutter at a slight angle. Since I had to trim it anyway so that it would not show around the edges of my rug, this was not too much of a problem. I had to cut 4" off the width to square it up. Had I needed a 3' x 5' rectangle I would have had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: snowyh

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Does its job well. Couple of issues: 1) It doesn't come with any tool to help you align it correctly with the heavy rug. You will end up rolling and unrolling your rug on it a few times before you get it right, so that it doesn't stick out from one of the sides. 2) At least on my Qing Spyder Bamboo floor, it leaves the checker pattern that is.... tough to get rid of. Even though you will never see it since it will be covered with your rug, but it might be something I would be worried about if I do decide to remove the rug from that area in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Prey

customer_reviews.title: Great non slip rug pad
customer_reviews.text: Great non slip rug pad! I learned the hard way and didn't originally put non-slip pads under my new rugs. Had a rug slip out from under me and fell and broke my elbow. Don't be me... get yourself some non-slip rug pads! These work absolutely great for what they are designed for. I have had no more rug mishaps in my house since putting these under all my rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug pad to make a rag rug for my grandsons room. It is exactly what I was looking for and seems to be made rugged enough to withstand his vigorous playtime. I would definitely buy again and the shipping as super quick! Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: klafave

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, did required  trimming
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this brand and another same size. Liked this one best, easier to spread and adjust. Did get size and square feet I ordered but was cut irregular and had to trim all sides. My rug was slightly less than 8x10 so had to trim anyhow. Like the fact it is eco friendly if indeed it is. Works great as described and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: shilohdad

customer_reviews.title: A little grip, but not quite enough to keep the rug in place.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't stop our rugs from moving, but it did help. I'm not faulting the product, as much as our slick, hardwood floor. I found the product liked to bunch up, and stick to itself, more than the rug, or the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS ADVERTISED, Great for safety!
customer_reviews.text: This was a little bit larger than my throw rug, but easily trimmed to fit. It absolutely works for anti-slip, which is important as I'm disabled & use mobility aids to get around. Easy to roll up with the rug when cleaning to keep positioned. Highly recommend for safety!
customer_reviews.author: Stephy M

customer_reviews.title: Works to keep pee pads from slipping
customer_reviews.text: I got this non slip rug pad to fit into a washer/dryer drain tray that I'm using to hold three of the Costco pee pads for my dogs. It keeps the pee pads from sliding around in the drain tray, which was preventing them from using it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kistner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Thickness - Rug Pad 9' x 12'
customer_reviews.text: Nice thickness and seems sturdy. Not thin like alot of the "store bought" rug pads at the big box stores and department stores. Really pleased with this rug pad. And the price was very reasonable. Again, nice thickness! Glad I bought this pad. Will be buying another for a smaller rug.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. It is thin and does not add ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. It is thin and does not add bulk to the carpet. It prevents slips much better than the alternatives I have tried. You can also cut the material to make a non-slip mat for the floor of your automobile or SUV trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, does the job and keeps my rug from sliding all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: TX3

customer_reviews.title: Leaves marks on hardwood
customer_reviews.text: This product left marks on my hardwood floors in under a year. Its almost like it ate away the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the price! I have tried other products that stuck to the floor but not to the rug. The pad can be trimmed to fit and is washable. Will definitely recommend to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase, product keeps rugs in place and is nice and cushy
customer_reviews.text: Very effective at keeping rugs in place- on hardwood and bathroom tile. Love the added cushion. It was very easy to trim the pieces to fit, and combine leftover pieces for other rugs. No sliding when vacuuming or using the carpet steamer, and it doesn't bunch up underneath the rug like some padding. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SarahS

customer_reviews.title: Great pad for my new Hemp rug
customer_reviews.text: Great pad for my new Hemp rug. It adds a little cushion which is nice on the hardwood floors & is earth friendly as well :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Mellott

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to cut down to fit my slightly smaller area ...
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to cut down to fit my slightly smaller area rug, and the rug isn't slipping. It did bunch up a little as I unrolled the rug, but I managed to smooth it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine, but thin and not substantial. If you need grip you should probably go up a notch in quality.
customer_reviews.author: MadiDaisy

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty good. I'm using it on an 8'x10' rug ...
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good. I'm using it on an 8'x10' rug and it doesn't move. The tape didn't work at all but this does after it's been installed for a few days then it sticks well to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easily trimmed if needed
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick. I was worried about the smell in a nursery, but it didn't give off any odor. Great product. Easily trimmed if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I liked the fact that it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I liked the fact that it had no offensive odor to it when I took it out of the package. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R E

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesion
customer_reviews.text: Easy to trim (I used this 4x6 for two smaller 2x3 rugs). Adhesion is great. Adequate cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: M. Merion

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't anywhere near a straight cut, but went under a rug so didn't matter. Sloppy craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: MayMaySays

customer_reviews.title: Finally,  a pad that works
customer_reviews.text: Works great on wood laminated floors. I was having a hard time getting rug tape to stick, but this has done the trick. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: TDE

customer_reviews.title: Works great underneath a expensive rug in our living room.
customer_reviews.text: Works great underneath a expensive rug in our living room. I bought two of these thinking i was going to have to double it up but one was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: KEndow

customer_reviews.title: Good pad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good pad for the money. Not non slip, I have to move my rug back away from the door every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: No more shifting rug.
customer_reviews.text: Eco Non Slip Rug Pad is working well under the new rug that was recently purchased. Holds it in place and gives it a bit of a cushy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jean R Smith

customer_reviews.title: For a craft project
customer_reviews.text: I got them for a craft project, making my own shag rugs with fabric scraps and they worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fixes the runner in front of my stove and adds some needed cush to the rug. No strange smells. Good quality fabric.
customer_reviews.author: DrSparx

customer_reviews.title: very non-slip but I would like it a tad thicker for cushon
customer_reviews.text: could be a tad thicker but otherwise it is very non-slip also carpet does not slip on top of it
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and great for the price. Unlike other brands, they extend past the rug and we like that as that covers and protects the whole hard wood
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Good product; does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a gripper; easy to cut to whatever size you want. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be fine. I put it under the rug in my ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be fine. I put it under the rug in my office because the rug its self is rather thin.
customer_reviews.author: mrsdmr

customer_reviews.title: Provides a nice light cushion as well
customer_reviews.text: Completely solved my rug slip problems. I can't believe I ever tried to live without it. I plan to get more for a couple other small rugs and you can cut them also! Provides a nice light cushion as well
customer_reviews.author: Zakiyyah

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective non slip rug pad. Use in my living room and there was a huge different before and after. Rug doesn't move!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Becker

customer_reviews.title: It does the job, a little difficult to have ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, a little difficult to have it down flat and aligned but nothing 2 people together can't handle.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Effective & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This worked better than I expected given that the price was lower than equivalent products from other sellers. I used this on both laminate wood and tile and it stayed equally well on both. The way I tested it was to do the "running man" dance on each rug - which is super risky because I could land on my face if the rug moved - but thankfully they stayed put! Just a note - I purchased the 4x6 size and cut it up to use on several rugs. The 4x6 was easily large enough to cover one 3x5 rug and THREE separate 17x24 inch bath mats. It was much more cost effective (and eco friendly) this way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pad great price
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than I could buy it locally, it showed up quickly and is a great product. Works well as a rug pad.
customer_reviews.author: Tmax Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PAD
customer_reviews.text: Good pad for the price. Easy to cut to size if necessary. Very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Stick

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality anti-slip rug pad that works very well on laminate floor. And the price is hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust the size by simply cutting it with scissors. Stays in place and keeps rug in place.
customer_reviews.author: Laureen Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Rugs stay put now
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No slipping. Had to trim down the size and it was very easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: NYreviewer

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: had to cut because they didn't make the size I needed, but great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Toast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Does all it says it does. My jute rug looks great and very firmly adhered to the wood.
customer_reviews.author: BeaReads

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and a great value for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty and a great value for the price I paid. It looks more expensive than what it actually was.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Perry

customer_reviews.title: Spot on.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed, adds a little bit of cushion and rug stays perfectly put!!
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rug doesn't slip-amazing! What will they think of next?
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: excellent rug pad, perfect size and very speedy shipping from seller a very positive purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bry Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: like that I can trim to fit what i need
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I bought the 5x8 size for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought the 5x8 size for a 5x7 rug on a parquet floor. My rug is much more stable now. For the remaining 1x7, I cut it up into thirds and used it for my bathmat. Very easy to work with!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: nice rug pad
customer_reviews.text: nice rug pad, as described; I don't yet know if it can be washed, but it doesn't seem so. Will consider this before buying in the future.
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Great price--fit well and easy to trim if needed
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 pads for new rugs. Great price--fit well and easy to trim if needed. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Dog Owner in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, great value for the price. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DiCat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to trim and grips perfectly. Rug doesn't move at all. Had if for almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: It holds the rug in place and does its job ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds the rug in place and does its job. Placing it under the rug was (in my opinion) a two-person job, though, as placing it solo with this rug pad was a huge hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Roether

customer_reviews.title: works great! simply trimmed the edges to make for a ...
customer_reviews.text: works great! simply trimmed the edges to make for a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: hotchili

customer_reviews.title: Good rug pad.
customer_reviews.text: A good rug pad, does exactly what it should do.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin-Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: pads work just like they should, hold rug in place and provide extra padding. Nice to walk on.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Carson

customer_reviews.title: No Slip
customer_reviews.text: Great non slip rug. I ended up cutting it shorter on a few sides to fit under my 4x6 rug, but it works great and the rug doesn't move at all on the hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennstl

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go under a wool handmade rug. I have hardwood floors and the rug slipped under me every time I stepped on it. This rug pad has solved the problem perfectly. I needed to trim it somewhat which was very easy to do. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Shiner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well, doesn't have a funny smell like the other ones. Easy to move if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 small dogs that like to run around in my house
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 small dogs that like to run around in my house. I have tile floors and I bought this item hoping that the rug would stay in place but it doesn't. The shape of the pad wasn't right either I had to take some scissors to trim it into the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price - I wish it were ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price - I wish it were a little smaller than the rug size because we have to cut all the way around it in order to hide it under standard rug size. That takes extra time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: I had to trim this to fit our rugs, ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to trim this to fit our rugs, but so far, it has kept them all in place, even with a toddler, two cats, and dog running around on them. I cannot believe I did not have rug pads for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great, I used it for a runner in my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I used it for a runner in my kitchen and has been successful thus far. I even used it under the legs of my sectional sofa that liked to slide around on the wood floor. Great cost effective solution.
customer_reviews.author: Brohovsky

customer_reviews.title: This came sized correctly and was easy to unfold and lay down
customer_reviews.text: This came sized correctly and was easy to unfold and lay down. I haven't had any issues with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price. Fit my 8 x 10 rug perfectly, now it doesn't move an inch. Also my hardwood floors are protected.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great and were pretty inexpensive compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: If anything made my area rug more of a slip ...
customer_reviews.text: If anything made my area rug more of a slip hazard. The rug is on a hard surface and is less slippery without the "non" slip pad. Save your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly as I thought it would be. Holds rug in place perfectly
customer_reviews.author: tvman

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, and it's priced better than the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works beautifully to keep my rug in place, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: so what

product_meta.title: NaturalAreaRug Century Non Slip Rug Pad Earth Friendly Provides Extra Cushion For All Hard Surfaces of size 8’ x 10’. Heavier and Thicker than Most Rug Pads
product_meta.description: Size:8 ft. x 10 ft.Free & Same Day Shipping within Continental USA. International Shipping Available (Contact us for a quote). Most rugs require rug pads. Not only do rug pads protect your rug from wear and tear, but they also protect your hardwod floor. Rug pads can be cut down to any shape or size to fit your rug to ensure your rugs longevity.
feature_bullets: Made with premium plant based oil and earth friendly.
Keeps rugs from sliding on hard surfaces
Easy to cut with household scissors to fit any size rugs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
